test_cases.test_name: Installation verification and media checksum validation
test_cases.objective: Verify that the custom application is installed on the qualified server using the approved SOP and that the installation media integrity is confirmed via checksum comparison.
prerequisites: Qualified server with approved baseline image
Installation media v1.0.0 with vendor-supplied SHA-256 hash

test_steps.action: Review server build records to confirm OS version, patch level and hardening settings meet specification.
test_steps.expected_result: All server attributes match the approved build specification.

test_steps.action: Copy installation media to secure staging folder and generate SHA-256 checksum.
test_steps.expected_result: Calculated checksum is generated without error.

test_steps.action: Compare generated checksum to vendor-supplied value.
test_steps.expected_result: Checksum values match exactly, confirming media integrity.

test_cases.test_name: Database schema deployment and version control verification
test_cases.objective: Confirm that the application database schema is deployed using version-controlled scripts and that deployment is fully logged.

test_steps.action: Execute automated schema deployment script from validated repository branch.
test_steps.expected_result: Script executes without error and returns success code.

test_steps.action: Verify schema version table reflects correct build number post-deployment.
test_steps.expected_result: Schema version matches application build 1.0.0.

test_cases.test_name: Service start-up, shutdown and auto-restart verification
test_cases.objective: Ensure all application services start, stop and automatically restart per design, maintaining system availability after planned and unplanned interruptions.

test_steps.action: Manually stop each application service via operating system console.
test_steps.expected_result: Services stop cleanly with status 'Stopped'.

test_steps.action: Start each service manually.
test_steps.expected_result: Services start without error and status is 'Running'.

test_steps.action: Simulate power failure and reboot server to test auto-restart.
test_steps.expected_result: All services auto-restart and application login page is accessible within 2 minutes.

acceptance_criteria: Services stop and start without error

test_cases.test_name: Sample login functional workflow verification
test_cases.objective: Verify that the custom sample login screen captures all required attributes and enforces configured validation rules as defined in the URS.

test_steps.action: Navigate to sample login screen and enter valid data for all mandatory fields.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample is accepted and assigned unique ID.

test_steps.action: Attempt to save sample with missing mandatory field 'Batch number'.
test_steps.expected_result: System displays validation error and prevents save.

acceptance_criteria: Missing mandatory field blocked with clear error

test_cases.test_name: Expiry date auto-calculation algorithm verification
test_cases.objective: Confirm that the application correctly calculates expiry date based on manufacturing date and product master data rules.
prerequisites: Valid product master data with shelf life configured

test_steps.action: Enter manufacturing date 2024-01-15 for product with 24-month shelf life.
test_steps.expected_result: Expiry date auto-populates as 2026-01-14.

test_steps.action: Change shelf life in master data to 18 months and repeat entry.
test_steps.expected_result: Expiry date recalculates to 2025-07-14.

acceptance_criteria: Calculated dates match expected values within ±1 day

test_cases.test_name: Out-of-Specification (OOS) rule execution positive path
test_cases.objective: Validate that custom business rule for OOS detection triggers correctly when result exceeds defined limit.
prerequisites: Analytical method configured with OOS limits

test_steps.action: Enter test result value exceeding upper limit by 1%.
test_steps.expected_result: System flags result as OOS and creates investigation record.

test_cases.test_name: Stability study protocol configuration functional test
test_cases.objective: Ensure stability study protocols can be created, saved and scheduled according to URS requirements using custom UI controls.

test_steps.action: Create new stability protocol with three pull points and save.
test_steps.expected_result: Protocol saved with status 'Draft'.

test_steps.action: Submit protocol for approval and approve as QA.
test_steps.expected_result: Status changes to 'Approved' and schedule generated.

acceptance_criteria: Protocol moves through Draft to Approved
Schedule dates align to pull points

test_cases.test_name: OOS rule negative testing for boundary conditions
test_cases.objective: Validate that OOS rule does NOT trigger for results within specification, including boundary values.

test_steps.action: Enter result exactly equal to upper specification limit.
test_steps.expected_result: System accepts result without OOS flag.

test_steps.action: Enter result exactly equal to lower specification limit.
test_steps.expected_result: System accepts result without OOS flag.

acceptance_criteria: No OOS flag set for boundary results

test_cases.test_name: Electronic worksheet data entry and save operation
test_cases.objective: Verify that configured electronic worksheet supports data entry, calculations and save with proper unit conversions.

test_steps.action: Enter raw peak area values and invoke calculation.
test_steps.expected_result: Calculated potency is displayed with correct units.

test_steps.action: Save worksheet.
test_steps.expected_result: Worksheet saved and version number incremented.

test_cases.test_name: Electronic worksheet versioning and audit trail verification
test_cases.objective: Ensure each save operation creates an immutable audit trail entry capturing old and new values, user and timestamp.

test_steps.action: Modify previously saved worksheet value and save again.
test_steps.expected_result: New version created; audit trail entry logged.

test_steps.action: Review audit trail log for change.
test_steps.expected_result: Audit trail shows original and changed values with user ID and timestamp.

acceptance_criteria: Audit trail entry complete and unalterable

test_cases.test_name: Continuous temperature monitoring functional verification
test_cases.objective: Validate that system records temperature every 5 minutes and displays real-time graph per URS.

test_steps.action: Simulate sensor input of constant 5 °C for 20 minutes.
test_steps.expected_result: Four readings stored at 5 °C exactly 5 minutes apart.

test_cases.test_name: Standard report generation and content verification
test_cases.objective: Verify that the system can generate vendor-standard batch release reports with correct data and signatures.

test_steps.action: Generate batch release report for batch B12345.
test_steps.expected_result: PDF report generated without error.

test_steps.action: Review report content for completeness and electronic signature blocks.
test_steps.expected_result: All required sections populated; signature blocks present with correct names.

test_cases.test_name: Two-stage electronic review workflow verification
test_cases.objective: Confirm that Analyst and Reviewer roles perform two-stage electronic review with enforced separation of duties.

test_steps.action: Analyst submits result record for review.
test_steps.expected_result: Status changes to 'Pending Review'.

test_steps.action: Reviewer approves record.
test_steps.expected_result: Status updates to 'Reviewed' and record locks for editing.

test_cases.test_name: Custom business logic unit test suite execution
test_cases.objective: Execute automated unit tests covering 95% of custom code paths including error handling routines.

test_steps.action: Run automated unit test suite via CI/CD pipeline.
test_steps.expected_result: All tests execute; total pass rate ≥95%.

test_steps.action: Review coverage report.
test_steps.expected_result: Coverage ≥95% across modules.

test_cases.test_name: Error handling and graceful recovery functional test
test_cases.objective: Validate that application gracefully handles division-by-zero error in calculation module and logs exception.

test_steps.action: Invoke calculation with denominator zero.
test_steps.expected_result: System handles error without crash and logs detailed exception.

acceptance_criteria: Error log captured with stack trace

test_cases.test_name: SAP ERP interface data exchange integration test
test_cases.objective: Verify bi-directional data transfer between application and SAP using vendor standard adapter.

test_steps.action: Send sample registration data to SAP and capture response.
test_steps.expected_result: SAP acknowledges receipt with success status.

test_steps.action: Pull material master update from SAP.
test_steps.expected_result: Application updates product record accordingly.

test_cases.test_name: Sample login API integration boundary test
test_cases.objective: Ensure API rejects sample login requests exceeding field limits and returns controlled error codes.

test_steps.action: Submit payload with batch number >10 characters.
test_steps.expected_result: API returns HTTP 400 with validation error code.

test_cases.test_name: LDAP authentication integration positive flow
test_cases.objective: Validate successful user authentication via corporate LDAP and role mapping within application.

test_steps.action: Login with LDAP credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User authenticated and assigned correct application role.

test_cases.test_name: LDAP authentication failure handling
test_cases.objective: Ensure application locks account after three consecutive failed LDAP logins and records audit trail.

test_steps.action: Attempt login with incorrect password three times.
test_steps.expected_result: Account locked; audit trail entry recorded.

test_cases.test_name: Normal load performance baseline test
test_cases.objective: Establish baseline response times under typical daily load of 100 concurrent users performing routine tasks.

test_steps.action: Execute load test script simulating 100 users for 60 minutes.
test_steps.expected_result: Average page response time ≤2 seconds.

test_cases.test_name: Stress test at peak load conditions
test_cases.objective: Determine system behavior at 300% peak load to identify performance bottlenecks and stability limits.

test_steps.action: Run stress test with 300 concurrent users generating maximum transactions.
test_steps.expected_result: No unhandled exceptions; response time ≤5 seconds; graceful degradation only.

test_cases.test_name: Data retention and archival performance validation
test_cases.objective: Verify that 7-year data archive job completes within required window and data remains retrievable.

test_steps.action: Execute archive job for 1 million records.
test_steps.expected_result: Job completes within 2 hours without error.

test_steps.action: Retrieve archived record and display.
test_steps.expected_result: Record displays correctly within 3 seconds.

test_cases.test_name: Role-based access control security verification
test_cases.objective: Confirm that only authorized roles can access restricted functions and audit trail captures all access attempts.
prerequisites: Roles configured: Analyst, Reviewer, QA Approver

test_steps.action: Attempt to approve record as Analyst.
test_steps.expected_result: Access denied and attempt logged.

test_steps.action: Approve record as QA Approver.
test_steps.expected_result: Approval succeeds and audit log entry created.

test_cases.test_name: Electronic signature cryptographic validation
test_cases.objective: Verify that electronic signatures are uniquely linked to individuals and cryptographically secure.

test_steps.action: Capture signature hash for approved record.
test_steps.expected_result: Hash generated using approved algorithm (SHA-256).

test_steps.action: Attempt to tamper with signed record.
test_steps.expected_result: System detects tampering and invalidates signature.

test_cases.test_name: Penetration test for SQL injection vulnerabilities
test_cases.objective: Conduct controlled penetration test to detect SQL injection vulnerabilities in public APIs.

test_steps.action: Run automated SQL injection test suite against API endpoints.
test_steps.expected_result: No vulnerabilities detected; all inputs sanitized.

test_cases.test_name: Audit trail integrity checksum verification
test_cases.objective: Ensure audit trail tables are protected by scheduled checksum job and discrepancies are flagged.

test_steps.action: Run checksum job manually and review output.
test_steps.expected_result: No checksum discrepancies found.

test_cases.test_name: Audit trail review and export data integrity test
test_cases.objective: Verify that audit trail records are reviewable, exportable in CSV format and include all required metadata fields.
prerequisites: Audit trail entries present from previous tests

test_steps.action: Export audit trail for selected record set.
test_steps.expected_result: CSV exported containing user, timestamp, old value, new value.

test_steps.action: Open CSV and verify immutability hash.
test_steps.expected_result: Hash validated successfully.

test_cases.test_name: Data migration integrity verification after upgrade
test_cases.objective: Ensure data migrated from previous version remains intact using record counts and spot checks.

test_steps.action: Compare record counts pre- and post-migration.
test_steps.expected_result: Counts match exactly.

test_steps.action: Perform spot check on 20 random records.
test_steps.expected_result: All field values identical.

test_cases.test_name: Concurrency performance test during data migration window
test_cases.objective: Measure system performance while migration job runs concurrently with 50 active users.

test_steps.action: Start migration job and initiate 50 user load performing typical tasks.
test_steps.expected_result: Average response time ≤3 seconds; no migration errors.

test_cases.test_name: User acceptance scenario – end-to-end product release
test_cases.objective: Execute full end-to-end process from sample login to batch release to confirm system meets business needs.

test_steps.action: Login as Analyst, create sample, record results and submit for review.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample progresses to 'Pending Review'.

test_steps.action: Login as Reviewer, approve results, then QA releases batch.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch status set to 'Released' and release report generated.
